title: PCSC plugin very slow since 2.2.2
body:
it seems to have a problem on linux with the JNA implementation.
 communication with PCSC diver is really slow.

2024-09-27 13:05:38,099 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 00 00] --> apduRequest: APDU_REQUEST = {"apdu":"801400000800000000C13236F0","successfulStatusWords":["9000"],"info":"Select Diversifier"}, elapsed 15109.6 ms
2024-09-27 13:05:39,068 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 00 00] <-- apduResponse: APDU_RESPONSE = {"apdu":"9000","statusWord":"9000"}, elapsed 969.0 ms
2024-09-27 13:05:39,069 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 00 00] --> apduRequest: APDU_REQUEST = {"apdu":"801C40001A351119970101000000000100000001010000A000000111110000","successfulStatusWords":["9000"],"info":"Data Cipher"}, elapsed 0.3 ms
2024-09-27 13:05:42,589 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 00 00] <-- apduResponse: APDU_RESPONSE = {"apdu":"3851DB41F28DF5969000","statusWord":"9000"}, elapsed 3519.9 ms
